entity.name: conditions
entity.query: SELECT id, experiment_id, name, sbeams_project_id, species_id, growth_media_recipe_id, owner_id FROM conditions

entity.name: growth_media
entity.query: SELECT name, description, url FROM growth_media_recipes WHERE id='${conditions.growth_media_recipe_id}'

entity.name: species
entity.query: SELECT name, alternate_name FROM species WHERE id='${conditions.species_id}'

entity.name: observations
entity.query: SELECT name_id FROM observations WHERE condition_id='${conditions.id}'

entity.name: controlled_vocab_items
entity.query: SELECT name FROM controlled_vocab_items WHERE id='${observations.name_id}'

entity.name: observations
entity.query: SELECT string_value FROM observations WHERE condition_id='${conditions.id}'

entity.name: users_echid
entity.query: SELECT DISTINCT last_name, first_name FROM users_echid WHERE id='${conditions.owner_id}'

entity.name: features
entity.query: SELECT features.value as f_value, genes.name as gene_name, data_types.name as data_name FROM features INNER JOIN genes ON features.gene_id=genes.id JOIN data_types ON features.data_type=data_types.id WHERE features.condition_id='${conditions.id}'

entity.name: condition_groupings
entity.query: SELECT condition_group_id FROM condition_groupings WHERE condition_id='${conditions.id}'

entity.name: tags_echid
entity.query: SELECT DISTINCT tag_category_id FROM tags_echid WHERE condition_id='${conditions.id}'

entity.name: tag_categories
entity.query: SELECT category_name FROM tag_categories WHERE id='${tags_echid.tag_category_id}'

entity.name: tags_echid
entity.query: SELECT DISTINCT tag FROM tags_echid WHERE condition_id='${conditions.id}'
